Uses of Class
magazine_service.Customer

    • Uses of Customer in magazine_service

      Subclasses of Customer in magazine_service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AssociateCustomer
      Represents an associate customer who is associated with a paying customer.
      class  PayingCustomer
      The PayingCustomer class represents a paying customer in the magazine service.
      Methods in magazine_service that return types with arguments of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Customer> MagazineService.getCustomers()
      Gets the list of customers.
      Methods in magazine_service with parameters of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean MagazineService.addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the list of customers.If the customer is an associate customer, it associates them with the corresponding paying customer.
      void MagazineService.removeCustomer(Customer customerToRemove)
      Removes a customer from the list of customers.
      Constructor parameters in magazine_service with type arguments of type Customer 
      Constructor and Description
      MagazineService(Magazine magazine, java.util.List<Customer> customers)
      Constructs a MagazineService object with the specified magazine and list of customers.
